ValidationRule.description: Cannot change status to Ready for Execution, if End date is a past date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Config2__Status__c , 'Ready for Execution') , Contract_end_date__c < TODAY(), OR(ISCHANGED(Apttus_Config2__Status__c), ISCHANGED( Contract_end_date__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: End Date cannot be a past date
